alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 24 at 3:16PM EST until January 25 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Sullivan county. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 10 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow, heavy at times Wednesday morning and afternoon transitions to a wintry mix of sleet, freezing rain and rain Wednesday evening. Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour will be possible at times. Areas of blowing snow could develop Wednesday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
